tool_description: Enrolls eligible customers into loyalty programs with customizable enrollment parameters and welcome bonus allocation.

customer_id.description: Unique identifier for the customer to enroll

enrollment_source.description: Source of enrollment: online, in-store, mobile-app, phone, email

welcome_bonus_points.description: Bonus points to award upon enrollment

opt_in_marketing.description: Whether customer opts into marketing communications

preferred_communication.description: Preferred communication method: email, sms, mail, none

error_messages: Customer already enrolled: This customer is already a member of the specified loyalty program.
Invalid enrollment source: Use one of [online, in-store, mobile-app, phone, email].
Invalid communication preference: Use one of [email, sms, mail, none].
Welcome bonus exceeds limit: welcome_bonus_points cannot exceed program maximum.
Customer ineligible: Complete eligibility validation before enrollment.
usage: Provide customer_id, program_id, and enrollment_source. Optionally configure welcome_bonus_points, opt_in_marketing, and preferred_communication.

member_number.description: Unique loyalty program member number assigned

enrollment_date.description: Date and time of enrollment completion

welcome_points_awarded.description: Number of welcome bonus points credited
